title: 004 - The Tony Bruno Award Winner
description: On today’s show, the guys talk about the Corona Virus epidemic, Pat receiving the Tony Bruno award in New York City, the different religions of the world, and Tony splits everyone into teams for more Digs Debates. Everyone gives their Stooge/Sellaht of the Week, discuss the next Avatar movies coming out, and finish on a History Fact from Tone . Send in your music submissions to the show @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter, and St. Paddy’s day merch is still 20% off with promo code WINSTPADDYS at store.patmcafeeshow.com. Enjoy.
